channel.title: Camelot-PvP Revived
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img697.imageshack.us/img697/6071/cammynoglow.png[/img]
Note- I did not make Camelot-PvP or Project Insanity. I am just using Project-Insanity as a base and re-creating Camelot-PvP with more features making it even funner to play.
[size=14pt]-Intro-[/size] Im sure almost every one has heard of the source/server called Camelot-PvP or Crazy-PvP right? Well as time went on it slowly started to fall behind other newer sources that were more updated then Camelot-PvP. So I have decided to revive Camelot-PvP and bring it back to the great Pickup and Pk server it was.
[size=14pt]-Quick Facts-[/size] Server Base- Project-Insanity (Riotscape) Client Base- Galkon's Refractored 459 look a like, loading a 474 cache Server Type- Spawning (Pickup and Pk) -Adding More Soon-
[size=14pt]-Features/Progress-[/size] Red = Not Started Blue = In Progress Green = Finished
Full PvP World All Godswords Working 100% Melle Following Range Following Mage Following 100% Auto Casting Custom Multi Combat Area Behind The Bank 100% Duel Arena Real Saradomin Sword Special (And I Mean Real...) Real/Working Darkbow Special With Dragon Arrows Custom Reset Stats Commands 474 Item List (Prayer Robes, Etc) 100% Multi Barrage/Burst No Trading Working Bolt Effects/Gfx (Dragon Bolts, Etc) All Skillcape Emotes Working (For The Luls) Ava's Accumulator 100% Working "Equip Your Character..." Interface Working 474 Prayers Working Clan Chat With / To Talk Hans (Teleporter Guy) Custom Pure Fighting Zone Custom Zerk Fighting Zone Custom Tank Fighting Zone Dragon Claws Pk Point Shop (No More Reward Crate) All Cammy PvP Shops With More Pk Points PvP Armour (Might Not Add) Lunar Spells Count Down Timer (After Going In-Side A Safe Spot)
Adding More Soon
[size=14pt]-In Depth Info-[/size] I will go into depth on some of the features I have listed above.
-Skillcape Emotes- Since I was going to use this client and server for my current server then decided not to due to glitchs I had already coded in the Skillcape Emotes. So might as well use them here
-Pk Point Shop- Instead of having the classic Reward Crate that gave you a random Item I have decided to make a Pk-Point Shop letting you choose what you want to buy.
-Duel Arena- About 1 year ago when i first got into rsps and used Cammy-PvP as my servers base I was always bugged by my players to code in a Duel Arena. So I decied to keep the current Duel Arena To Let People Have a break and have some fun fights.
-Custom Fighting Zones- Since I was having trouble coding it so you can only fight people 10 above your level or 10 lower your level I decided to just make custom zones that require You to have done the Command to let you In that area. For Example you would have to Do ::tank to go in the tank Area or ::pure to go in the pure area. That way level 126's can't come and kill you.
-Custom Multi-PvP Area- Since I want to use the party room for another area I decided to code in another area right behind the Camelot bank by the Maple Trees For People to have team fights. I Plan on Making This Area Bigger.
-No Custom Items- When I coded my Camelot-PvP Source about 1 year ago I had alot of customs... This lead to people quiting because of over powered weapons making me release the source... That was the biggest mistake I have made so now I no longer have any Customs in any of my servers. So no worrying if that guy with the Energy Sword is gonna 1 hit you...
More In-Depth Info Coming Soon
[size=14pt]-Pictures-[/size] Ags Spec [img]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/4821/agsstill.png[/img] Real Sara Sword Spec [img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/1866/ssstill.png[/img] Multi Combat Area [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/4359/mutli.png[/img] Duel Arena [img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/9332/duelarena.png[/img] Dark Bow Spec [img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/1130/dbowstill.png[/img]
I am Currently Uploading The Pictures Now. I Have Dial-Up So It Will Take Awhile...[/center]

item.title: Camelot-PvP Revived
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

What Should The Next Update Be?

-King of the Hill (Duel Turnements basicly but in mutli)
-Pk Tasks (Kind of like slayer but you may get a task like, You have to kill icestorm 2 times) When you complete one you get 15 Cp (Cp = Pk Point basicly)
-Clan Wars (Self Explainitory)
-Other (Suggest it here)

Read full topic

item.title: Camelot-PvP Revived
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[center]

Note- I did not make Camelot-PvP or Project Insanity. I am just using Project-Insanity as a base and re-creating Camelot-PvP with more features making it even funner to play.

[size=14pt]-Intro-[/size]
Im sure almost every one has heard of the source/server called Camelot-PvP or Crazy-PvP right? Well as time went on it slowly started to fall behind other newer sources that were more updated then Camelot-PvP. So I have decided to revive Camelot-PvP and bring it back to the great Pickup and Pk server it was.

[size=14pt]-Quick Facts-[/size]
Server Base- Project-Insanity (Riotscape)
Client Base- Galkon’s Refractored 459 look a like, loading a 474 cache
Server Type- Spawning (Pickup and Pk)
-Adding More Soon-

[size=14pt]-Features/Progress-[/size]
Red = Not Started
Blue = In Progress
Green = Finished

Full PvP World
All Godswords Working 100%
Melle Following
Range Following
Mage Following
100% Auto Casting
Custom Multi Combat Area Behind The Bank
100% Duel Arena
Real Saradomin Sword Special (And I Mean Real…)
Real/Working Darkbow Special With Dragon Arrows
Custom Reset Stats Commands
474 Item List (Prayer Robes, Etc)
100% Multi Barrage/Burst
No Trading
Working Bolt Effects/Gfx (Dragon Bolts, Etc)
All Skillcape Emotes Working (For The Luls)
Ava’s Accumulator
100% Working “Equip Your Character…” Interface
Working 474 Prayers
Working Clan Chat With / To Talk
Hans (Teleporter Guy)
Custom Pure Fighting Zone
Custom Zerk Fighting Zone
Custom Tank Fighting Zone
Dragon Claws
Pk Point Shop (No More Reward Crate)
All Cammy PvP Shops With More
Pk Points
PvP Armour (Might Not Add)
Lunar Spells
Count Down Timer (After Going In-Side A Safe Spot)

Adding More Soon

[size=14pt]-In Depth Info-[/size]
I will go into depth on some of the features I have listed above.

-Skillcape Emotes-
Since I was going to use this client and server for my current server then decided not to due to glitchs I had already coded in the Skillcape Emotes. So might as well use them here

-Pk Point Shop-
Instead of having the classic Reward Crate that gave you a random Item I have decided to make a Pk-Point Shop letting you choose what you want to buy.

-Duel Arena-
About 1 year ago when i first got into rsps and used Cammy-PvP as my servers base I was always bugged by my players to code in a Duel Arena. So I decied to keep the current Duel Arena To Let People Have a break and have some fun fights.

-Custom Fighting Zones-
Since I was having trouble coding it so you can only fight people 10 above your level or 10 lower your level I decided to just make custom zones that require You to have done the Command to let you In that area. For Example you would have to Do ::tank to go in the tank Area or ::pure to go in the pure area. That way level 126’s can’t come and kill you.

-Custom Multi-PvP Area-
Since I want to use the party room for another area I decided to code in another area right behind the Camelot bank by the Maple Trees For People to have team fights. I Plan on Making This Area Bigger.

-No Custom Items-
When I coded my Camelot-PvP Source about 1 year ago I had alot of customs… This lead to people quiting because of over powered weapons making me release the source… That was the biggest mistake I have made so now I no longer have any Customs in any of my servers. So no worrying if that guy with the Energy Sword is gonna 1 hit you…

More In-Depth Info Coming Soon

[size=14pt]-Pictures-[/size]
Ags Spec

Real Sara Sword Spec

Multi Combat Area

Duel Arena

Dark Bow Spec

I am Currently Uploading The Pictures Now. I Have Dial-Up So It Will Take Awhile…[/center]
